Articles.Content: Hi, i have an issue with recovering vessels, maybe a bug. I just recovered a test that just splashed down really near KSC, it dudnt fly any far at all. But when i recover the probe, ut says it was recovered 942.5 km from KSC!!! and only got 54% refunds. It is not the first time it happens to me. Do you know anithing about this issue?
Ok, it was due to Kopernikus , they solved it in newer releases.
